summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2532 for the improvement of Ninth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-fifth Street to East Fiftieth Street; Tenth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-fifth Street to East Forty-seventh Street; and Eighth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-seventh Street to Playfield between East Forty-seventh Street and East Fiftieth Street; and East Forty-seventh Street from Seventh Avenue Northeast to Tenth Avenue Northeast all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 29414, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
